title: Piquant potato salad
ingredients: ['2 medium sized potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm dice', '2 spring onions, finely sliced', '1 fat clove garlic, peeled', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons good quality mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon salad cream', '1 teaspoon paprika (or to taste)', '2 cherry peppers from jar, seeded and finely diced']
